channel.title: Fun Zones
channel.description: I want to make an area that whe nu kill eathoter and you die you wont lose stuff and your enemy wont get ur stuff. How do I make this?

item.title: Fun Zones
item.dc:creator: @magep00ner12 magep00ner12
item.description:
@magep00ner12 wrote:

[quote=“bhpkyeah, post:2, topic:200389”]if (actionTimer == 0 && IsDeadTimer == true && (absX >= xxxx && absX <= xxxx && absY >= yyyy && absY <= yyyy)) { teleportToX = xxxx; teleportToY = yyyy; IsDeadTeleporting = true; frame1(); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; NewHP = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]); setSkillLevel(3, getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]), playerXP[playerHitpoints]); playerLevel[3] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]); refreshSkills(); PoisonDelay = 9999999; KillerId = playerId; }[/quote]

nice… the enemy doesnt get anything but the one who gets defeated only keeps 3 items…
how do you make it so the one who gets defeated keeps all his items

Read full topic

item.title: Fun Zones
item.dc:creator: @bhpkyeah satesql
item.description:
@bhpkyeah wrote:

if (actionTimer == 0 && IsDeadTimer == true && (absX >= xxxx && absX <= xxxx && absY >= yyyy && absY <= yyyy)) { teleportToX = xxxx; teleportToY = yyyy; IsDeadTeleporting = true; frame1(); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; NewHP = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]); setSkillLevel(3, getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]), playerXP[playerHitpoints]); playerLevel[3] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]); refreshSkills(); PoisonDelay = 9999999; KillerId = playerId; }
